VecMath::Matrix::CopyLoop

VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::CopyLoop< i, j, D_ > Struct Template Reference

Copy a matrix to another, element by element. More...

#include <matrix.H>

Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
template<unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
struct VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::CopyLoop< i, j, D_ >

Copy a matrix to another, element by element.

A template metaprogramming version of a copy loop is necessary to make sure that the compiler knows all elements of the matrix.
